pages.text:
About Us
.entry-header
Spruce Creek Golf & Country Club is an attractive, active adult community developed by Del Webb located between Gainesville and Orlando, just 15 miles south of Ocala. This gated community of 3,250 homes is located on 1,604 acres. It is large enough to offer the best of modern amenities and small enough to provide a small-town living experience.
The location places it within easy reach of three major cities and the most popular Florida getaways. It is within 110 miles of Jacksonville, 85 miles of Tampa and Daytona Beach, 30 miles from the Gulf of Mexico and 60 miles from the magic of Orlando.
Facilities
Golf is a central part of our community. Eagle Ridge Golf Course features 36 holes of scenic and challenging championship golf, a fully staffed pro shop and The Toppers Tavern Restaurant. In addition, Spruce Creek Golf & Country Club’s primary amenities provide a platform that is designed to appeal to a broad range of individual interests.
The Horizon Center Area contains a 32,000-sq.-ft. community center which features a warm lobby with a library, a multi-purpose ballroom, community kitchen, meeting and game rooms. Located adjacent to the Eagle Ridge Golf Pro Shop and the Toppers Tavern Restaurant, the area is completed with a heated outdoor pool and spa with covered lanai, bocce and shuffleboard courts.
The centerpiece of the Lake Vista Recreation Area is a 14,000 -sq.-ft. Fitness Center with an indoor lap pool, and state-of-the-art weight training and cardiovascular equipment. The complex also contains a large pavilion, horseshoe pits, a walking trail through The American Kestrel Preserve, the Veterans Memorial and a gem of a softball diamond.
The third recreation area is Peninsula Park which is a haven for fresh air lovers containing volleyball, tennis and pickleball courts, and a large heated outdoor pool and spa.
Activities
Onsite, more than 70 clubs supported by a full-time activities director provide opportunities to satisfy almost any interest. Outside the front gate, ample local shopping, entertainment venues, medical and emergency services are all within easy reach.
Homes
Spruce Creek Golf & Country Club offers a broad range of re-sales featuring over 40-floor plans priced from the mid-100s to the 400s. Houses range in size from 800 to 2,800 climate-controlled square feet. Monthly amenity fees are consistently among the very lowest in central Florida.
Combine all the factors: small-town living; convenient to Florida’s major attractions; desirable local resources; great modern facilities; and a variety of attractive floor plans and you have Del Webb’s Spruce Creek Golf & Country Club. Enjoy browsing this website to find out more.
.entry-content .clear
#post-##

Contact Us
.entry-header
Professional and Knowledgeable Staff
Responsibilities for a CAM are as follows:
Provide administrative support and guidance to the Board of Directors, in assisting with coordination of Board and Membership Meetings, record keeping, and communications.
Enforcement of the Association’s rules and regulations as dictated by the governing documents and promulgated by your Board of Directors.
Oversight of vendors hired by the Association for contractual obligation compliance.
Other duties as specified by the Board of Directors or outlined in the Association’s management contract to support the operations of the Association.
Your Community Association Manager and Leland Management’s dedicated support staff office hours are typically Monday through Friday from 9 am to 5 pm excluding holidays.
Meet The Team

Feel free to give us a call at (352) 307-0696
